title: Implement fallback search in common macOS locations
description: Add fallback logic when spec file is not found at provided path. Search in order: current directory, ~/Documents/, ~/Downloads/, ~/Desktop/. Return first match or list all matches if multiple files with same name exist. This catches cases where users provide filename without path.
notes: Subtask of 89. COMPLETED: Added 'Fallback Search (File Not Found)' section to smart-bootstrap.md (lines 128-169). Implements search across common macOS locations in priority order: current dir, Documents, Downloads, Desktop. Handles single match (auto-use), multiple matches (list with timestamps for user choice), and no matches (proceed to iCloud search in Task 107). Includes example interaction showing automatic detection. Builds on Task 105's path expansion.
user_benefit: System automatically finds spec files in common locations when path is incomplete
